channel.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M621
channel.description: The latest traffic information for England's motorway and trunk routes provided by the Highways Agency.

image.title: Latest Traffic Information for England - All confirmed events, on the M621

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M621 eastbound within J3 after J4 exit | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M621 eastbound at junction J3, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 10:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M621 eastbound between J2 and J2A | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M621 eastbound between junctions J2 and J3, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M621 westbound between J3 and J2A | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M621 westbound between junctions J3 and J2, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M621 westbound between J3 and J2A | Westbound | Roadworks
item.description: On the M621 westbound between junctions J3 and J2, minor delays are possible due to roadworks . Expect disruption until 5:00 am.

item.author: ha_info@highways.gsi.gov.uk
item.title: M621 J4 eastbound exit | Eastbound | Roadworks
item.description: The M621 eastbound exit slip at junction J4 will be closed due to roadworks, between 6 am and 10 am, from 1 October 2011 to 2 October 2011.
